scripts.theme: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.deploy: aws s3 sync public/ s3://www.meegada.in/ --profile kowmudi
scripts.deploycontent: aws s3 sync public/ s3://www.meegada.in/ --delete --cache-control "max-age=3600, public" --exclude "*" --include "*.html" --include "*.xml" --profile kowmudi
scripts.deploytemplates: aws s3 sync templates/ s3://${TEMPLATE_BUCKET}/templates/${CODEBUILD_GIT_CLEAN_BRANCH}/ --delete --acl public-read --cache-control "max-age=86400, public"
